main event: A military report details an unidentified flying object observed on December 23, 1957, using both ground radar and visual observation.
interesting points: The sighting involved one object with erratic changes in return shape and size,Estimated speed of the object was between 500 to 900 mph at an altitude of 10,000 feet,The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes,There was no physical evidence confirmed from the sighting,The report suggests the observation may be a possible visual/electronic observation.
witness description: Military personnel involved in the observation and reporting.
